title: In need of 8 RP

embed.description: RP Art! Moocow Alistar! - Netherlilly Gaming - Google+

body: I am in need of 8 RP to buy a hextech key, please help. Here is my art offering!

replies.body: That is the cutest cow I've ever seen, I just want to hug it and give it all the noms.  {{summoner:31}}

Can helper poros be like... A thing now.
Forever.
Thanks.
